comment: Did you leave the ground coffee in the fermenter? Also, did you chose that coffee for a specific reason?

I didn't leave it in the fermenter, I just let it steep in the hot wort. I put it into the wort as soon as I turned off the heat and left it in until the wort was cool enough for the fermenter. If you ever try some 100% Knoa coffee from Hawaii you'll see why I used it - - exceptionally smooth as a dark roast, with full flavor and no bitterness.
